name: Ancient Warriors Allied Generals - Shuanglong
text:
2 Beast-Warrior monsters, including a WIND "Ancient Warriors" monster
All "Ancient Warriors" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. You can only use each of the following effects of "Ancient Warriors Allied Generals - Shuanglong" once per turn.
? If this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Ancient Warriors" card from your Deck to your hand.
? (Quick Effect): You can send 1 card from your hand or field to the GY, then target 1 face-up card your opponent controls; return it to the hand.
